Verses: 1 UNGALUKKULLE YUTHTHANGALUM SANDAIGALUM EDHINAALE VARUGIRADHU; UNGAL AVAYAVANGALIL POR SEYGIRA ICHCHAIGALINAALALLAVAA?

2 NEENGAL ICHCHITHTHUM UNGALUKKU KIDAIKKAVILLAI; NEENGAL KOLAISEYDHUM, PORAAMAIYULLAVARGALAAYIRUNDHUM, ADAIYAKKOODAAMARPOGIREERGAL; NEENGAL SANDAIYUM YUTHTHAMUM PANNIYUM, NEENGAL VINNAPPAM PANNAAMALIRUKKIRADHINAALE, UNGALUKKU SITHTHIKKIRADHILLAI.
3 NEENGAL VINNAPPAMPANNIYUM, UNGAL ICHCHAIGALAI NIRAIVETRUMPADI SELAVAZHIKKAVENDUMENDRU THAGAADHAVIDHAMAAI VINNAPPAMPANNUGIRAPADIYINAAL, PETRUKKOLLAAMALIRUKKIREERGAL.
4 VIBASAARARE, VIBASAARIGALE, ULAGA SINEGAM DHEVANUKKU VIRODHAMAANA PAGAIYENDRU ARIYEERGALAA? AAGAIYAAL ULAGATHTHUKKU SINEGIDHANAAYIRUKKA VIRUMBUGIRAVAN DHEVANUKKU PAGAIGNANAAGIRAAN.
5 NAMMIL VAASAMAAYIRUKKIRA AAVIYAANAVAR NAMMIDATHTHIL VAIRAAKKIYA VAANJAIYAAYIRUKKIRAARENDRU VEDHAVAAKKIYAM VEENAAI SOLLUGIRADHENDRU NINAIKKIREERGALAA?
6 AVAR ADHIGAMAANA KIRUBAIYAI ALIKKIRAARE. AADHALAAL DHEVAN PERUMAIYULLAVARGALUKKU EDHIRTHTHU NIRKIRAAR, THAAZHMAIYULLAVARGALUKKO KIRUBAI ALIKKIRAARENDRU SOLLIYIRUKKIRADHU.
7 AAGAIYAAL, DHEVANUKKU KEEZHPPADINDHIRUNGAL; PISAASUKKU EDHIRTHTHU NILLUNGAL, APPOZHUDHU AVAN UNGALAIVITTU ODIPPOVAAN.
8 DHEVANIDATHTHIL SERUNGAL, APPOZHUDHU AVAR UNGALIDATHTHIL SERUVAAR. PAAVIGALE, UNGAL KAIGALAI SUTHTHIGARIYUNGAL; IRUMANAMULLAVARGALE, UNGAL IRUDHAYANGALAI PARISUTHTHAMAAKKUNGAL.
9 NEENGAL THUYARAPPATTU THUKKITHTHU AZHUNGAL; UNGAL NAGAIPPU THUKKIPPAAGAVUM, UNGAL SANDHOSHAM SANJALAMAAGAVUM MAARAKKADAVADHU.
10 KARTHTHARUKKU MUNBAAKA THAAZHMAIPPADUNGAL, APPOZHUDHU AVAR UNGALAI UYARTHTHUVAAR.

11 SAGODHARARE, ORUVARUKKORUVAR VIRODHAMAAI PESAADHIRUNGAL; SAGODHARANUKKU VIRODHAMAAI PESI, THAN SAGODHARANAI KUTRAPPADUTHTHUGIRAVAN NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANATHTHIRKU VIRODHAMAAIPPESI NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANATHTHAI KUTRAPPADUTHTHUGIRAAN; NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANATHTHAI KUTRAPPADUTHTHUVAAYAANAAL, NEE NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANATHTHINPADI SEYGIRAVANAAYIRAAMAL, ADHARKU NIYAAYAADHIPADHIYAAYIRUPPAAI.
12 NIYAAYAPPIRAMAANATHTHAI KATTALAIYIDUGIRAVAR ORUVARE, AVARE RATCHIKKAVUM AZHIKKAVUM VALLAVAR; MATRAVANAIK KUTRAPPADUTHTHUGIRADHARKU NEE YAAR?
13 MELUM, NAANGAL INDRAIKKU ALLADHU NAALAIKKU INNA PATTANATHTHIRKUP POI, ANGE ORUVARUSHAM THANGI, VIYAABAARANJEYDHU, SAMBAATHTHIYAMPANNUVOMENGIRAVARGALE, KELUNGAL.
14 NAALAIKKU DAPPADHU UNGALUKKU THERIYAADHE. UNGAL JEEVAN EPPADIPPATTADHU? KONJAKKAALANDHONDRIP PINBU THONDRAAMARPOGIRA PUGAIYAIPPOLIRUKKIRADHE.
15 AADHALAAL: AANDAVARUKKU SITHTHAMAANAAL, NAANGALUM UYIRODIRUNDHAAL, INNINNADHAI SEYVOM ENDRU SOLLAVENDUM.
16 IPPOZHUDHU UNGAL VEEMBUGALIL MENMAIPAARAATTUGIREERKAL; IPPADIPPATTA MENMAIPAARAATTAL YAAVUM POLLAANGAAYIRUKKIRADHU.
17 AADHALAAL, ORUVAN NANMAISEYYA ARINDHAVANAAYIRUNDHUM, ADHAI SEYYAAMARPONAAL, ADHU AVANUKKU PAAVAMAAYIRUKKUM.
